name: Simply Suds [Proof of Concept Edition]
description:
Bubbles duke it out as they try to collect the most coins in a limited amount of time. The spin cycle of the washing machine adds a chaotic element that may help or hinder players.

May the cleanest bubble win! DEFAULT CONTROLS:
  • A/Left/J/F - Move Left
  • D/Right/L/H - Move Right
  • W/Up/I/T - Inflate
  • S/Down/K/G - Deflate

Use the mouse to navigate the main menu.

Inflating will increase your size and make you float upwards, while deflating will decrease your size and make you fall.

Collect coins by touching them. The game will end when the timer hits zero.

NOTE: The default controls are highly discouraged when playing with three or four players!  Unless player three and player four like being smooshed between everyone else. I won't judge. Use controllers for large parties! ALSO NOTE: This is a WIP!! As in "this is nowhere near finished"! I hope to add more things like better graphics, more accurate bubble physics, an elimination mode, spikes, popping other players, and more! TRIPLE NOTE: The Mac and Linux versions of the game haven't been tested! I don't have computers to test on so they might be unstable or broken. :<
